original_text: Moreover, Manasseh shed very much innocent blood, till he had filled Jerusalem from one end to another, besides the sin that he made Judah to sin so that they did what was evil in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 므낫세가 유다에게 범죄하게 하여 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행한 것 외에도 또 무죄한 자의 피를 심히 많이 흘려 예루살렘 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 가득하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Moreover, Manasseh shed very much innocent blood,
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 므낫세는 매우 많은 무죄한 피를 흘렸으니,

sentences.original_text: till he had filled Jerusalem from one end to another,
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘이 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 피로 가득하게 되었으며,

sentences.original_text: besides the sin that he made Judah to sin,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 유다로 범죄하게 한 죄 외에도,

sentences.original_text: so that they did what was evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들이 악한 일을 행하게 하여

sentences.original_text: in the sight of the Lord.
